Menace
[i]Bone Carver[/i] – Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, exile it. Create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Deen, Bladed Sandstorm attacks, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, up to one target creature gets -0/-3 until end of turn.
Partner with Sonya, Vengeful Mage
